sentences.en: At the first call of the music, she became irresponsible.
sentences.cn: 只要一听到音乐开始召唤, 她就不管三七二十一了.

sentences.en: He regarded the young man as feckless and irresponsible.
sentences.cn: 他认为这个年轻人不光无能，还不负责任。

sentences.en: I felt that it was irresponsible to advocate the legalisation of drugs.
sentences.cn: 我认为鼓吹毒品合法化是不负责任的行为。

sentences.en: I was made to feel guilty and irresponsible.
sentences.cn: 我被弄得心生内疚，觉得自己很不负责任。

sentences.en: It is irresponsible to let small children go out alone when it's dark.
sentences.cn: 天黑后还让小孩子单独出去,这是很不负责的行为.

sentences.en: It is very irresponsible of him not to answer my letter.
sentences.cn: 不回复我的信是他太不负责任.

sentences.en: It was highly irresponsible of him to leave the children on their own in the pool.
sentences.cn: 他把孩子们独自留在游泳池里，真是太不负责任了。

sentences.en: It would be irresponsible of me not to advise my company to abandon this project.
sentences.cn: 若我不建议公司放弃这个项目，那我就是不负责任。

sentences.en: It would be irresponsible to ignore the situation.
sentences.cn: 对这一状况不闻不问，那就是不负责任。

sentences.en: Many people have an irresponsible attitude towards marriage and relationships.
sentences.cn: 很多人对婚姻与两性关系持一种不负责任的态度。

sentences.en: Petitioners suggest that anything less than certainty, that any speculation, is irresponsible.
sentences.cn: 申诉者认为不准确的事或推断都是不负责任的.

sentences.en: She described his remarks as irresponsible, inflammatory and outrageous.
sentences.cn: 她称他的话不负责任、具煽动性且极端无礼。

sentences.en: The interview was offensive and sickeningly irresponsible.
sentences.cn: 访谈很无礼并且相当不负责任。

sentences.en: The mischief arose from irresponsible gossip.
sentences.cn: 这种不幸的事是因无聊的闲话而引起的.

sentences.en: Thick patchy fog and irresponsible driving were to blame.
sentences.cn: 局部浓雾和驾驶员不负责任是罪魁祸首。

sentences.en: We are against the irresponsible attitude of standing aloof from things on the ground that they're no concern of ours.
sentences.cn: 我们反对事不关己,高高挂起的自由主义态度.

words.tran_cn: 不可抵抗的；不能压制的；极为诱人的

trans.tran_cn: 不负责任的，不可靠的，缺乏责任心，[法律] 无责任能力的，无需对更高一级权力负责的
trans.tran_en: doing careless things without thinking or worrying about the possible bad results

trans.tran_cn: 不负责任的人， 无责任感的人
